file.name: azure.com-maintenance-Maintenance-2018-06-01-preview-swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: Azure Maintenance Management Client
  title: MaintenanceManagementClient
  version: 2018-06-01-preview
  x-apisguru-categories:
    - cloud
  x-logo:
    url: https://assets.onestore.ms/cdnfiles/onestorerolling-1606-01000/shell/v3/images/logo/microsoft.png
  x-origin:
    - format: swagger
      url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs/master/specification/maintenance/resource-manager/Microsoft.Maintenance/preview/2018-06-01-preview/Maintenance.json
      version: "2.0"
  x-providerName: azure.com
  x-serviceName: maintenance-Maintenance
  x-tags:
    - Azure
    - Microsoft
paths:
  /providers/Microsoft.Maintenance/operations:
    get:
      description: List the available operations supported by the Microsoft.Maintenance
        resource provider
      operationId: Operations_List
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ApiVersionParameter"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationsListResult"
              examples:
                Operations_List:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/Operations_List"
        default:
          description: BadRequest
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/MaintenanceError"
      summary: List available operations
      tags:
        - Operations
      x-ms-pageable: {}
  "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Maintenance/maintenanceConfigurations":

        - description: Resource Identifier

          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
          examples:
            MaintenanceConfigurations_GetForResource:
              value: configuration1

      responses:

          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/MaintenanceConfiguration"
              examples:
                MaintenanceConfigurations_GetForResource:

        default:
          description: BadRequest
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/MaintenanceError"

      tags:

    patch:

      parameters:

        - description: Resource Group Name
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true

            type: string

              value: examplerg
        - description: Resource Identifier
          in: path
          name: resourceName
          required: true

            type: string
          examples:

              value: configuration1

      requestBody:

        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/MaintenanceConfiguration"
              examples:
                MaintenanceConfigurations_UpdateForResource:
                  $ref: "#/components/examples/MaintenanceConfigurations_UpdateForR\
                    esource"
        default:

          content:

              schema:

      tags:

    put:

      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/SubscriptionIdParameter"
        - description: Resource Group Name
          in: path
          name: resourceGroupName
          required: true

          examples:

        - description: Resource Identifier
          in: path

          examples:

      tags:
